summary: Logos.lean root file is missing from Theories/ directory, breaking default lake build. File existed historically (commit 3c9dc688) and implemented a clean re-export pattern for public API. Recommend restoration of the file from git history to maintain Logos/Bimodal separation.

artifacts.summary: Complete investigation of missing Logos.lean: lakefile expectations, directory structure, git history showing file deletion point, comparison to Bimodal.lean pattern, build failure details, and recommendation to restore from commit 3c9dc688.
